title: A visual verification tax comes due
description: In 2026, newsrooms face a new reckoning: Either you’ve built out visual investigative competence or you’ll pay the price in lengthy corrections, lost credibility, and missed opportunities. The visual documentation available today — such as eyewitness images, satellite imagery, drone footage and other sensor data — offers journalists unprecedented amounts of material to craft stories...
